description:
Hey guys,
since i installed budgie-remix my efi boot screen is just a gray page.
Is this a know issue?
I attached a picture of it, i hope you know what i mean..
comments.comment:
press and hold the shift button on boot to display grub.  Press e to edit - look for the line that ends "quiet splash $handoff" - remove these and press ctrl+x to boot.  Can you get a photo where it appears to hang?; Doesn't seem to hang anywhere really..
Maybe 2 seconds at 'Reached Target Bluetooth' but thats all..
Just to clarify what i ment: Normally in place of the gray screen there is the logo of the mainboard manufacturer (asrock in my case).
After that the spinning budgie bootscreen appears..; ok - so it boots ok?  Have you just got budgie-remix installed - any other operating systems?  If you just have budgie-remix then I would expect that - its the grub screen colour.; Yes it boots fine. Sorry if i didn't make that clear..
Just budgie-remix but still: Long time ubuntu user here, and i never had this before..
